---
title: "PvalIssue"
output: html_document
date: "2023-02-08"
---

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(rstatix)

test <- read.csv("ExampleOfDifferentPvals.csv")

#Works
test %>%
  mutate(grouping = as.factor(grouping)) %>%
  t_test(SMTH ~ grouping)

test %>%
  mutate(grouping = as.factor(grouping)) %>%
  anova_test(SMTH ~ grouping, detailed = T)

#not
test %>%
  mutate(grouping = as.factor(grouping)) %>%
  t_test(intensityName ~ grouping)


test %>%
  mutate(grouping = as.factor(grouping)) %>%
  anova_test(intensityName ~ grouping, detailed = T)
```
